name: [C]Atelier
description:
[C]Atelier is a calm game made for the Mini Game Jam.

As a curious little cat, you try to reach the end of a mystic dungeon. 

Don't be afraid! You can (and should) leave the dungeon and restart :)

The dungeon, however, can only be completed with specific totems. The countless times that you go through that dungeon you will find more and more items to sell at the CatStore.

With your hard earned money you will be able to by totems from the shaman!

Good luck!!
